Name: DemoPlayerForbidUpdateArea
Notes: An area that prevents several player components from updating while a cutscene is active. These components include reacting to Onimasu movement, several collision interactions, getting damaged by Karikari, sliding, AreaMove speed up as well as moving object speed up, warping and much much more.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
